article.title: Apogen Technologies to Operate IRS Chief Counsel's Information Technology Infrastructure
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Treasury Department has awarded QinetiQ North America's subsidiary Apogen Technologies a $7 million task order under the department's Total Information Processing Support Services (TIPSS-3) contract to continue its support of the Internal Revenue Service's (IRS) Office of Chief Counsel.
